title.value: Методика планирования финансовых результатов на основе приемов и методов статистического анализа
Technique of planning of financial results on the basis of receptions and methods of the statistical analysis

journal.title: Problems of Economics : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Trigub, M.V., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)
Gudkov, S.V., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: In course of the research there were studied the economic essence of the profit, some receptions and methods of the statistical analysis and also formation and planning of financial results. The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. The analysis of current trends of change of financial results is provided. The factors influencing them were considered. The management directions of agricultural organizations profit through planning improvement were offered. As a result of realized research it was revealed that recommended procedure of profit organization planning based on the use of techniques and methods of statistical analysis made it possible to determine its planned objective value. The planned amount of profit organizations in the future would affect the determination of the actual reality of securing financial resources and funds its activities, improve the organization of financial relations with the budget, extra-budgetary funds , banks, creditors and debtors, provide real balance projected revenues and expenses, solvency and financial stability.
